items.name: CrypTen
items.description: CrypTen is a Privacy Preserving Machine Learning framework written using PyTorch to train models using encrypted data. It is currently not production ready and its main use is as a research framework

items.name: Opacus
items.description: Train PyTorch models with Differential Privacy

items.name: PySyft
items.description: Perform data science on data that remains in someone else's server
